in_ports.description: Two ports for logical operation AND. Indexed from 0 to 1.
in_ports.name: IN[2]

out_ports.description: True if both IN[0] and IN[1] are true.
out_ports.name: OUT

types.description: Receives boolean packets from different connections and returns the number of them in TRUE and FALSE state
types.name: boolean/counter

out_ports.description: Number of connections in TRUE state
out_ports.name: TRUE

out_ports.description: Number of connections in FALSE state
out_ports.name: FALSE

types.description: Receives a boolean packet and forwards it through the TRUE or FALSE ports depending on its value.
types.name: boolean/filter

out_ports.description: Emits a packet with value TRUE when it recives a TRUE value on the IN port
out_ports.name: TRUE

out_ports.description: Emits a packet with value FALSE when it recives a FALSE value on the IN port
out_ports.name: FALSE

in_ports.description: Where to receive the input of NOT operation.
in_ports.name: IN

out_ports.description: True if 'IN' is false, false otherwise.
out_ports.name: OUT

in_ports.description: Two ports for logical operation OR. Indexed from 0 to 1.
in_ports.name: IN[2]

out_ports.description: True if either IN[0] or IN[1] is true.
out_ports.name: OUT

types.description: Receives an empty packet and toggle the boolean output.

in_ports.description: Where to receive the toggle trigger
in_ports.name: IN

types.name: boolean/toggle

members.description: the initial state, defaults to false.
members.name: initial_state

in_ports.description: Two ports for logical operation XOR. Indexed from 0 to 1.
in_ports.name: IN[2]

out_ports.description: True whenever both inputs differ (one is true, the other is false). False if IN[0] and IN[1] are the same.
out_ports.name: OUT

types.description: Apply desired computation when buffer fills or timeout happens.

in_ports.description: Receives an int packet to set the timeout time to be used.
in_ports.name: TIMEOUT

in_ports.description: Reset buffer and timer to its initial state.
in_ports.name: RESET

types.name: boolean/buffer

members.description: Number of samples that the buffer should hold.
members.name: samples

members.description: Timeout time in milliseconds. Default is zero which means that timeout is disabled.
members.name: timeout

members.description: Operation to be applied in the buffer elements to compute the output. Supported operations are: all_true, all_false, any_true, any_false.
members.name: operation
